Our Voices Leadership Message From Director of Black Excellence and Achievement Misty Levingston As director of Black excellence and achievement, one of my goals is to increase the number of Black students on campus. Therefore, it is imperative that our university is present in Black community spaces; creates a...


January 10, 2023

 









Doti Foresees Recession in 45th Economic Forecast President emeritus started event as economics professor in 1977. For the 45th year, Chapman University President Emeritus Jim Doti on Dec. 13 forecasted the future of the economy, mixing data with insights from colleagues and humorous takes on his half-marathon runs and appearance on...


December 16, 2022 Joy Juedes

 









Chapman Celebrates to Take Final Bow Chapman University’s 40th fundraising gala will be held in February for the last time. Chapman Celebrates – Chapman University’s signature gala that has raised more than $40 million for scholarships in the last 40 years – will take its final bow in February 2023. The Broadway-style show features singing...


December 16, 2022 Joy Juedes

 






Taking Care of Community: Gathering in Solidarity in the Face of Violence  Dear Chapman community,  These past weeks have been heartbreaking. Learning of the mass shooting against LGBTQ+ persons at Club Q in Colorado Springs brings forth anger and fear as we continue to face domestic...


November 23, 2022

 









Chapman University Engages Campus Community in Strategic Plan Development Chapman’s new Strategic Plan, “Our Path to Greatness,” will provide the university’s strategic roadmap through 2028.  Chapman University’s strategic planning process engaged a variety of campus stakeholders over a six-month period.  Planning began in June 2022 at a two-day planning retreat at the Fairmont Grand Del Mar resort in Del...


November 22, 2022

 









Chapman Staff, Alumni Receive Irvine Chamber’s 40 Under 40 Honors A Chapman University staff member and eight alumni were honored at the Greater Irvine Chamber of Commerce’s 40 Under 40 event. The Nov. 16 reception at the Irvine Marriott recognized the “next generation of business...

Chapman Increases Campus Housing with Purchase of New Residence Hall A newly acquired apartment building in the Platinum Triangle will make apartments available to more students.  On Nov. 16, Chapman University announced the acquisition of a new apartment building in Anaheim’s Platinum Triangle that will provide a significant increase to the number of students who can reside in campus housing...
